short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert PNG, JPEG, and WebP images to PDF

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Managing and converting into various file formats can be a cumbersome task. Whether for work, school, or personal use, the ability to seamlessly convert images into a more versatile format like PDF is invaluable. Image to PDF Converter is a powerful yet user-friendly Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of converting PNG, JPG, and WEBP files into high-quality PDFs.

You can use it via right clicking on any image or uploading images from your local to the extension.
